body: This really is like a gainax/studio trigger feat. teruaki "rave party" murakami work with a fusion between saber from "fate/japanosuke's self-insert harem franchise" and lillie from "pokemon: japs really like hawaii edition" as a mc but instead of sucking/rimming of the typical brown haired peanut skinned jap self-insert mc to defeat demons, they're getting tentacle'd by an ego inflated, perverted demon "sword" in order to "power it up" so they can either beat the demons with it or completely backfire and have it go "I'm the demonlord, bitches!" on them. Just another jap hentai work.
So we just extended the upload to another cliffhanger.
Just gonna say I don't like tentacles, that's all, see ya
TENTACLE FEST : WHOEVER READS THIS MUST GIVE AT LEAST ONE TENTACLE DOUJIN! (sorry if I spelt it wrong)
Damn. Best one this month, so far.
